item.description:
No official meeting this month.

Tasting at Bacon Wine and Spirits in Hudson,MA starting at 6:30.
BYOG - Bring your own glass.
Bacon Wine

Also, Chloes Bistro, Hudson, MA is having a Victor Hugo Wine dinner on Monday, March 10 at 7pm.
Vic Roberts, winemake/owner, combines his talents and stories with Matt Landry super chef/owner of Chloe's.
Send me email if you would like a copy of the menu.
Chloes Restaurant- Wine Dinner

About this Meetup
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy with the wine glass. :-) I will upload my picture to meetup.com website.
item.name: AWS March Chapter Meeting - Tasting at Bacon Wines
